section.name: Blogs
section.p: Any (open source) project exists solely because a community wants to support it. The Wicket community consists of the users and developers. There are many who want to share their experiences with Wicket and do so on the mailing lists , on several online media portals (for example The ServerSide and JavaLobby ), and on their blogs.
Here is a list of regular Wicket bloggers, consisting of core contributers and enthousiastic users.

ul.li: A Wicket Diary - Blog of Martijn Dashorst
Eelco's blog - Blog of Eelco Hillenius
Jonathan's blog - Blog of Jonathan Locke
Geertjan's blog - Blog of Geertjan Wielenga

subsection.name: Adding your blog
subsection.p: If you think your blog is missing, then please send a message to one of the core contributors or the mailinglist. In the mean time you can add your blog to our wiki's special blog page .
